title: 2 sought following deadly shooting at apartment complex
content:
LAS VEGAS (FOX5) -
Las Vegas Metro police are investigating a deadly shooting that occurred Monday evening at a north Valley apartment complex.
Police were notified of a shooting in the 2700 block of North Decatur Boulevard, near North Rancho Drive, about 6:30 p.m.
Witnesses reported hearing an argument followed by gunshots.
Officers arrived to find a man with numerous gunshot wounds. He was taken to University Medical center, where he was later pronounced dead.
Metro's Lt. Dan McGrath said the victim was young, possibly in his late teens, and that it appeared he had been shot twice. Witnesses reported seeing two men running from the area following the shooing. One had his hair in a ponytail, and the other man had a beard, McGrath said.
Stay with FOX5 for updates.
